titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase and extend the energy efficient commercial buildings deduction.
GREEN Buildings Act
Giving Reductions to Energy Efficient New Buildings Act
GREEN Buildings Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Giving Reductions to Energy Efficient New Buildings Act or the GREEN Buildings Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase the allowable amount of the tax deduction for energy efficient commercial building costs; and (2) extend such deduction through 2013.
